LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.0.label: a little hungry
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.1.label: Very hungry!
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.2.label: Hungry (endures)
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.2.description: Um... Should I eat a little flower from my ear...
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.3.label: Hungry (insufferable)
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.3.description: I've never been so hungry... Are these leaves edible...
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.4.label: Don't Starving
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.4.description: My stomach has never hurt so much. I feel like I'm going to faint...
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.5.label: Dystrophy
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.6.label: 【<color=#fbef97>No fear of death</color>】
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedFood.stages.6.description:
AHA... I can't believe I'm going to die like this... 

I can feel my life coming to an end, but rest assured, I'll be waiting on the ship. 

After my death, my body will provide valuable nourishment for other life... How ironic...
